articles.title: Boston ‘ICE Out Everywhere’ protest must-see moments
articles.description:
“We have to show up in every way for our immigrant siblings and all vulnerable communities in Massachusetts. It’s imperative,” one protester said.

The post Boston ‘ICE Out Everywhere’ protest must-see moments appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Protesters gathered in Boston Common to support immigrant rights on January 31, 2026.
Activists emphasized solidarity for vulnerable communities across Massachusetts during the demonstration.
The event highlights ongoing concerns about immigration policies affecting local residents.
